<script src="[[Dev2WebServer]]/scripts/mode-html.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>" IndexNumber="1"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[Dev2InjectedStyle]]" FieldValue="<style>
 #editor {
 position: absolute;
 width: 500px;
 height: 200px;
 background-color:#fff;
 }
</style>" IndexNumber="2"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[Dev2InjectScript]]" FieldValue="<script>
 var editor;
 var demoData = new Array();
 
 function updateLang(lang){
 editor.getSession().setMode(lang);
 }
 
 function init(){
 editor = ace.edit("[[Dev2EditorName]]");
 editor.setTheme("ace/theme/chrome");
 
 // add code folding ;)
 var session = editor.session;
 session.setFoldStyle("markbeginend");
 
 // no wrap with 80 char print line ;)
 session.setUseWrapMode(false);
 var renderer = editor.renderer;
 renderer.setPrintMarginColumn(80);
 
 updateLang("[[Dev2EditorLanguage]]");
 }
 $(document).ready(function(){
 init();
 });

 </script>" IndexNumber="3"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[Fragment]]" FieldValue="<div>
 [[Dev2InjectedStyle]]
 <br/>
 [[Dev2ScriptIncludes]]
 <br/>
 [[Dev2InjectScript]]
 <br/>
 <div id="[[Dev2EditorName]]"></div>
</div>" IndexNumber="4"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="5"> <uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> <scg:List x:TypeArguments="x:String" Capacity="0" /> </uaba:ActivityDTO.OutList> </uaba:ActivityDTO> </scg:List> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> </FlowStep> </Flowchart.StartNode> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> </Flowchart> </Activity>

Service.AuthorRoles: Domain Users,Windows SBS Remote Web Workplace Users,Windows SBS Fax Users,Windows SBS Folder Redirection Accounts,All Users,Windows SBS SharePoint_MembersGroup,Windows SBS Link Users,Company Users,Business Design Studio Developers,DEV2 Limited Internet Access,
